reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Conducting a scoping study to inform future work for the China Prosperity Fund Skills programme.

description.narrative: This project is designed to identify barriers to and opportunities for addressing China's skills gap, and to propose recommendations and interventions in specific sectors. The project will inform the design of the Skills programme of the China Prosperity Portfolio. The overall programme will support reforms across China's skills sector that deliver social and economic benefits and contribute to poverty alleviation. The Skills programme will generate opportunities for international business and bring benefits to UK companies in sectors where they are well placed to compete, including Education and Training. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
